ValidationRule.description: Rule to ensure phone number is valid.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(ISBLANK( PersonHomePhone )), NOT(OR( LEN(PersonHomePhone) = 12, LEN(PersonHomePhone) = 11, LEN(PersonHomePhone) = 9 )) )
&& NOT( $Permission.Exclude_from_Validation )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid Phone number.
